summary: In this context, 1,1,2,2-tetrachloroethene (PERC) is identified as a volatile organic compound (VOC) that falls under the broader category of organic chemicals. The text discusses the neurotoxic effects of various VOCs, including PERC, highlighting their common usage in industrial applications. However, the specific relationship between PERC and the general category of organic chemicals is not elaborated upon beyond its classification as a VOC.
